item.description:
Bonjour!

On se reunit au Starbucks au Nashua Mall (sortie 6 de la route 3, centre de commerce Burlington Coat Factory) ce mercredi 10 janvier 2007 a 19h30. Ce sera une occasion de raconter un peu des fetes, ou n'importe quoi.

A bientot!

Amy

Hello!

We are gathering at the Starbucks at the Nashua Mall (exit 6 off of Route 3, Burlington Coat Factory shopping center) Wednesday, Jan 10, 2007, at 7:30 pm to talk and tell a bit of what's been going on since our last meet-up.

See you soon,

Amy
item.name: Dis-moi French Conversation January Meetup
